alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Inland Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 4:17PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL BAY COUNTY THROUGH 445 PM EDT/345 PM CDT/... At 417 PM EDT/317 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lynn Haven, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Callaway, Springfield, Hiland Park, Bayhead, West Bay, Southport, Cedar Grove, Dirego Park, Recota Beach, College Station, Bayou George, Camp Flowers, Brannonville, Millville, Vicksburg, Majette, and Bay Harbor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
